授業目的:
The main objective is to improve students' ability to discuss educational issues in English.
The secondary objective is to improve their active vocabulary.
到達目標: By the end of the course, students should be able to discuss, give their opinions on and present on the issues raised in the course.
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法: Class will normally begin with warmup questions about recent events and the weather. There will be ample opportunity for pair and group work.

第1回: First Semester - Discussion Questions (two rounds); instructor's schedule.
第2回: First Semester - Discussion Questions (one round). Should We Celebrate or Condemn Apple's New Child Protection Measures? - model read. Vocabulary Matching Exercise.
第3回: Apple's New Child Protection Measures - read aloud & chorus (short segments); Vocabulary Matching Exercise.
第4回: Apple's New Child Protection Measures - read aloud & chorus (long segments); Comprehension Questions.
第5回: Apple's New Child Protection Measures - students read aloud in turns. Cloze.
第6回: Apple's New Child Protection Measures - students read aloud in turns.Cloze. Discussion Questions.

Study for first listening test.
Read Schools and covid-19: Poor students.
第7回: First listening test. Schools and covid-19: Poor students - model read. Vocabulary Matching Exercise.
第8回: Schools and covid-19: Poor students - read aloud & chorus (short segments). Vocabulary Matching Excercise.
第9回: Schools and covid-19: Poor students - read aloud & chorus (long segments). Cloze exercise.
第10回: Schools and covid-19: Poor students - students read aloud in turns. Cloze exercise.
第11回: Schools and covid-19: Poor students - students read aloud in turns. Comprehension & Discussion Questions.
